basics.name: Anthony Fresta
basics.label: Software Developer, DevOps, Manager
basics.summary: Anthony has 15+ years industry experience, has led software development teams, and built large complex systems to allow for complete automation of business processes. He is currently transitioning from managing software teams back to being an individual contributer in some form of security (ideally exploit development, penetration testing, or reverse engineering).

work.name: Exegy Inc
work.summary: Exegy continually innovates to meet evolving market challenges. Our flexible market data solutions address the diverse needs of the world’s leading market participants—from low-latency technology to real-time trading signals to historical simulation.
